API Integration Instructions
1.GatewayList API
URL: https://ingrammicro.clearblade.com/api/v/1/code/bacb8fb60bb4d7c2c2b1c0e4bb9701/GatewayList
Headers: 
{ "ClearBlade-UserToken":"Given Usertoken"}
Method: Post
Body: 
  { "networkUUID": "Given networkUUID"}
SampleResponse: 
   {
  "results": {
    "Method": "GatewayList",
    "Result": [
      {
        "BatteryLevel": "",
        "ClientName": "ingram",
        "ConfiguredSensors": 2,
        "GatewayID": 913201,
        "GatewayName": "",
        "GatewayType": "Ethernet Gateway",
        "Heartbeat": 5,
        "LastCommunicationDate": "",
        "MAC_Address": "70B3D502EA1E",
        "NetworkID": 34385,
        "NetworkUUID": "db3d6df8-0895-e6d3-8767-a31c08ae278b",
        "SignalStrength": ""
      },
      {
        "BatteryLevel": 101,
        "ClientName": "ingram",
        "ConfiguredSensors": 6,
        "GatewayID": 913526,
        "GatewayName": "CGW3 3g North America - 913526",
        "GatewayType": "",
        "Heartbeat": 5,
        "LastCommunicationDate": 1537269457000,
        "MAC_Address": "",
        "NetworkID": 34385,
        "NetworkUUID": "db3d6df8-0895-e6d3-8767-a31c08ae278b",
        "SignalStrength": 16
      }
    ]
  },
  "success": true
}
2.SensorList API
URL: https://ingrammicro.clearblade.com/api/v/1/code/bacb8fb60bb4d7c2c2b1c0e4bb9701/SensorList

 {"ClearBlade-UserToken":"Given Usertoken" }
Method: Post
Body:
